content: Hello Mister Heine, thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Ryanah Rahman

content: Thank you for considering my apartment. I am open to discussing the rental price with you. What are you looking to pay per month?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
Your rental price is 500 Euros per month.

Hi Mister Heine, thank you for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.

My rental price for this apartment is 500 Euros per month. Is there any room for negotiation?
name: Ryanah Rahman

content: Thank you for sharing the rental price. I appreciate your interest in the apartment, but I'm afraid the 500 Euros per month is not a negotiable price for me. I would be happy to discuss any additional terms or conditions that may be of interest to you, but the rental price is non-negotiable.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I understand. Thank you for letting me know. I will have to look elsewhere.

TERMINATE
name: Ryanah Rahman

content: Thank you for your understanding. I appreciate your interest in the apartment, but I'm sorry that it did not work out. I wish you the best of luck in finding the perfect rental for your needs. If you have any further questions or need any additional information, please don't hesitate to contact me.
name: Heinrich Heine
